msg: 有外國朋友在問，計畫來 g0v summit ，在台灣待個十天，有沒有推薦的住宿地方？
我覺得讓外國參與者揪團住 Airbnb 好像不錯 XD
不知道之前有沒有中研院附近的推薦旅館清單之類的東西
南港馥華商旅  早餐優房間乾淨、近中信園區、南港展覽館、車站，但到 Sinica 要坐車才到得了。
不要問為什麼沒有人做….
另一個免費主機 https://lionfree.net/ ，不過他們自己的官方網站掛了...XD

路過 :smile:
Hey Friends!!
Just a reminder that the IFF Community Development Fellows Program
*applications are due this week on August 22*! If you could help spread
the word, we would really appreciate it
https://internetfreedomfestival.org/fellowship/
This is a great opportunity for people that are passionate about
developing their local communities. Not only will they be connected to a
network of community builders, they will also play an intrinsic part in
slackbot1's url: [Community Development Fellows Program | Internet Freedom Festival]
curating the programming for the IFF.
If you yourself are not applying, try to encourage people that you think
would be a good fit. (FYI, the application is very short and to the point).
